import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react'; import { AppContext } from '../Context/AppContext'; import Table from './Table'; const AddOrder = ({ tableNumber, handleGoBack }) => { const [dispatch] = useContext(AppContext); const [tables] = useContext(AppContext); const [categories] = useContext(AppContext); const [categoryClicked, isCategoryClicked] = useState(false); const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState(''); const handleCategory = (name) => { setSelectedCategory(name); }; const handleChange = (product, price) => {}; return (
Table: {tableNumber}
Products QTY Total
{tables[tableNumber].order.products.map((product, i) => ( {product}
))} {tables[tableNumber].order.quantities.map((quantity, i) => ( {quantity}
))} {tables[tableNumber].order.prices.map((price, i) => ( {price} €
))}
{categories.map((category, i) => selectedCategory === category.Category ? (
handleChange(category.name, category.price)} > {category.name} {category.price} €
) : null )}
); }; export default AddOrder;
